text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the AORUS 15-X9-RT4AD Core i7-8750H NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB Intel SSD 1 TB HDD Win10 15.6" FHD LG IPS 144 Hz Gaming Laptop -- ONLY @ NEWEGG!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the AORUS 15-X9-RT4AD Core i7-8750H NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB Intel SSD 1 TB HDD Win10 15.6" FHD LG IPS 144 Hz Gaming Laptop -- ONLY @ NEWEGG is solid, and the build material is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

The AORUS 15-X9-RT4AD Core i7-8750H NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB Intel SSD 1 TB HDD Win10 15.6" FHD LG IPS 144 Hz Gaming Laptop -- ONLY @ NEWEGG does what it says on the tin. Good for AAA gaming, but the battery life could be better. Had a minor issue with the initial setup taking longer than expected, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Fortnite. The build quality of the AORUS 15-X9-RT4AD Core i7-8750H NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB Intel SSD 1 TB HDD Win10 15.6" FHD LG IPS 144 Hz Gaming Laptop -- ONLY @ NEWEGG is solid, and the speakers is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 in the AORUS 15-X9-RT4AD Core i7-8750H NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB Intel SSD 1 TB HDD Win10 15.6" FHD LG IPS 144 Hz Gaming Laptop -- ONLY @ NEWEGG is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
